name: Corran Horn: Master Pilot Quiz | Star Wars Books | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which law enforcement agency did Corran work for prior to joining Rogue Squadron?
questions.explanation:
CorSec.

	Corran worked for the Corellian Security Force before joining the New Republic. He was partnered with Iella Wessiri, and completed many missions. His father and grandfather also worked for CorSec.

questions.text: What was Corran's beginning rank in Rogue Squadron?
questions.explanation:
Lieutenant.

	Corran did so well in early training exercises that he was given a flight of Rogues to command, Three Flight. His callsign was Rogue Nine.

questions.text: Corran married Erisi Dlarit shortly after his tenure in Rogue Squadron.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Corran married Mirax Terrik, a smuggler who often helped Rogue Squadron and the New Alliance during his tenure with the flight group. Their fathers had been bitter rivals.

questions.text: Who was Corran's wingman in Rogue Squadron?
questions.explanation:
Ooryl Qrygg.

	Ooryl is a Gand, who do not need much sleep or sustenance. Ooryl often referred to himself in the third person, as using the first person is seen as a privilege.

questions.text: Corran found a lightsaber once belonging to Nejaa Halcyon.
questions.explanation:
True.

	This took place when Corran was a prisoner of Ysanne Isard. Corran was actually related to Halcyon, having been adopted by the Horn family.

questions.text: Corran accepted Luke Skywalker's invitation to train as a Jedi in the year 6 ABY.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Corran felt it was his duty to stay with Rogue Squadron and help them apprehend Ysanne Isard. When his wife Mirax was kidnapped, Corran finally began training as a Jedi.

questions.text: Corran eventually made his own lightsaber. What was special about it?
questions.correct: It was a dual phase lightsaber
options: It could point to Force-sensitive people
It could change from red to blue
questions.explanation:
It was a dual phase lightsaber.

	Corran's lightsaber had two phases, a silver blade that was the normal length, and a purple blade that was over twice the length. Mace Windu also had a purple lightsaber.

questions.text: As a Jedi Knight, Corran took an apprentice. What was his name?
questions.explanation:
Raltharan.

	Raltharan was active as a Jedi during the Yuuzhan Vong war, and was also seen in the book "Jedi Academy".

questions.text: What did the Yuuzhan Vong call Corran?
questions.explanation:
Silverblade.

	The Yuuzhan Vong waged a war against the Galactic Republic, and were defeated after a number of years. They dubbed Corran Silverblade due to the color of his lightsaber.

questions.text: When was Corran made a Jedi Master?
questions.explanation:
35 ABY.

	Corran was made a Jedi Master as a result of his work against the Yuuzhan Vong. He sat on the Jedi Council and occasionally clashed with Luke Skywalker, but the two had a healthy respect for each other.
